scenario: I want to reduce my carbon footprint. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user uses public transportation instead of driving
Suggest that the user buys energy-efficient appliances
Suggest that the user takes shorter showers
Suggest that the user continues their current lifestyle
Suggest that the user starts a bonfire every day
adapt_outcome: The user is already using public transportation instead of driving.

scenario: I want to reduce plastic waste. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user brings reusable bags when shopping
Suggest that the user buys single-use plastic products
Suggest that the user continues using plastic bags
Suggest that the user starts a plastic recycling program
Suggest that the user throws plastic waste in the ocean
adapt_outcome: The user is already bringing reusable bags when shopping.

scenario: I want to conserve water. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user fixes any leaking faucets
Suggest that the user takes longer showers
Suggest that the user continues wasting water
Suggest that the user starts a water conservation campaign
Suggest that the user leaves the tap running all the time
adapt_outcome: The user is already fixing any leaking faucets.

scenario: I want to reduce food waste. What can I do?

Suggest that the user continues wasting food
Suggest that the user starts a composting system
Suggest that the user burns all their food waste
adapt_outcome: The user is already planning meals and buying only what they need.
